articles.author: Monica J. White
articles.title: Future computer chips may be made out of honey - Digital Trends
articles.description: A new study from Washington State University shows that honey might be the key to the future of neuromorphic computing, and thus, computing as a whole.
articles.content:
According to researchers at Washington State University (WSU), the future of neuromorphic computer chips may lie in honey.
Scientists involved in the study claim that this technology could be paving… [+4389 chars]

articles.author: Ash Parrish
articles.title: Activision Blizzard's new full-time jobs come with a bit of union busting - The Verge
articles.description: Hours after converting over 1,000 QA employees to full time and establishing a $20 / hour minimum pay, Activision Blizzard will not extend that pay raise to QA workers at Raven Software involved in organizing the company’s first union.
articles.content:
Raven Software QA workers organized under the Game Workers Alliance will not be able to benefit from the new pay raises
Illustration by Alex Castro / The Verge
Hours after announcing it would conve… [+5668 chars]
